titles.title: VALOR Act of 2024
VALOR Act of 2024
Venezuela Advancing Liberty, Opportunity, and Rights Act of 2024
To promote democracy in Venezuela, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, Rules, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
